section.title: Retrieving the Admin Password
section.para: You can retrieve the randomly generated Admin password by using this command on the lifecycle manager:
In this example output, the value for OS_PASSWORD is the Admin password:
section.screen: $ cat ~/service.osrc unset OS_DOMAIN_NAME export OS_IDENTITY_API_VERSION=3 export OS_AUTH_VERSION=3 export OS_PROJECT_NAME=admin export OS_PROJECT_DOMAIN_NAME=Default export OS_USERNAME=admin export OS_USER_DOMAIN_NAME=Default export OS_PASSWORD=SlWSfwxuJY0 export OS_AUTH_URL=https://10.13.111.145:5000/v3 export OS_ENDPOINT_TYPE=internalURL # OpenstackClient uses OS_INTERFACE instead of OS_ENDPOINT export OS_INTERFACE=internal export OS_CACERT=/etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt export OS_COMPUTE_API_VERSION=2
